About.Title: About
About.MainText: Business-thinking and multidisciplinary Full Stack Developer specializing in web, mobile, and app development since 2020.
About.Mission: Helping businesses convert their business ideas into high-end digital products that will leave their competitors behind and make people's life easier.
About.Experience: Worked in different business sectors such as Energy (ENGIE), Telecommunications (SFR), Real Estate (Atixis), etc. at both large companies and small startups/agencies.
About.Resume: More about my experience is in my resume.
About.CaseStudies: For in-depth case studies please get in touch.
About.Mentoring: Also helping other developers to build and grow their careers.

Experience.Title: Experience
Experience.ENGIE: 2024 - Working on the development of Engie Home Service B2C platform, which includes customer information and the services and equipment offered by the company.
Experience.SFR: 2021 - Development of a SaaS aimed at managing labels and generating products, discounts, and financing plans for the 800 SFR retail locations.
Experience.EPITECH: 2021 - Degree in Information Technology Engineering with a specialization in Software Engineering, registered at the RNCP at level 7.
Experience.ATIXIS: 2020 - Final year internship at a real estate project management company. Created a custom CRM to meet the company's business needs.

Contact.ContactCallText: Unlock the potential of your digital projects with tailor-made solutions designed specifically for you.
